author: Old_Nectarine_1414
comment: Hi OP, the distance is in fact a factor that can cause burnt out over time. But if you're interested in the course you're doing I'm sure you will be fine. So atb!

author: SquidwardBoobies
comment: hi! i was a cbp pfp student at tp too! the schedule in pfp is way worse than actual y1-3 imo since theres sch on all 5 days. most of my lessons in sem 1 were 9-6 except fridays but it got more relaxed in sem 2 where most were 9-1 or 9-2. as for the commute, i live terribly far from school as well but ive learnt to suck it up since i like actually my course and my classes
